row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.CHANGE_VM_STATE
row.description: Promptset to take input to change VM state

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="138" top="4" width="729"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Change state of Azure Virtual Machine"><properties><entry name="text">Change state of Azure Virtual Machine</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>
